pages.text: Brought into life by the spilling of Ymirs lifeblood, the dwarves have a strong binding with the earth, fire and the mountains. This makes them excellent and skilled metalworkers and craftsmen, and they take great pride in this. Ask a dwarf about his craft and you'll have him talking for days.

pages.title: Dwarf
pages.text: The dwarves are not native to the Feywild. They come looking for ore, gems and ingots.

pages.title: Dwarven Anvil
pages.text: They don't easily make friends with outsiders, but if you are one of the few who has earned the gratitude of a dwarf, you have a friend for life.
